recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.cookingDescription: Preheat the oven to 350째F. Mix dry ingredients in a bowl, then mix wet ingredients in another. Mix both together and pour into a greased cake pan. Bake for 30-35 minutes. Let it cool before serving.

recipes.name: Carrot Cake
recipes.cookingDescription: Preheat the oven to 350째F. Mix dry ingredients in a bowl, then mix wet ingredients in another. Mix both together and pour into a greased cake pan. Bake for 50-60 minutes. Let it cool before serving.

recipes.name: Lasagna
recipes.cookingDescription: Preheat the oven to 375째F. Cook the lasagna noodles according to the package instructions. In a pan, cook the ground beef, garlic, and onion. Add tomato sauce and let it simmer. Mix ricotta cheese with parmesan cheese. Assemble the lasagna in layers of noodles, sauce, and cheese. Bake for 30-35 minutes. Let it cool before serving.

recipes.name: Quiche
recipes.cookingDescription: Preheat the oven to 375째F. Cook the onion and spinach in butter until soft. Beat eggs and milk in a bowl. Add cheese, ham, and the spinach mixture. Pour into the pie crust. Bake for 40-45 minutes. Let it cool before serving.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.cookingDescription: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions. Cook the pancetta and garlic in olive oil. Beat eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl. Mix the spaghetti with the pancetta and garlic. Add the egg mixture and black pepper. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
recipes.cookingDescription: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Blend basil leaves, pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan cheese in a food processor. Slowly pour in olive oil while blending. Add salt to taste. Mix the pesto with the cooked pasta. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Linguine with Clams
recipes.cookingDescription: Cook the linguine according to the package instructions. Cook the clams, garlic, and olive oil in a pan. Add white wine and butter. Let it simmer. Add cooked linguine and mix. Add parsley, lemon juice, and red pepper flakes. Serve immediately.
